alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire; Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:13PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Berkshire and northeastern Columbia Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 313 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chatham, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Lenox, New Lebanon, Canaan, Richmond, Barkerville, Rayville, Red Rock, Riders Mills, New Lenox, Lakeview Terrace, New Britain, Rock City, The Center At Lenox, Stearnsville, Carey Corner, West Pittsfield, New Lebanon Center, West Lebanon and Stevens Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
